original_text: Aaron must offer the bull as an atonement to the Lord for himself, his family and his servants.
korean_text: 아론은 자기를 위한 속죄제의 수송아지를 드리되 자기와 집안을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: as an atonement to the Lord
for himself, his family and his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 자신을 위해, 그리고 자기 가족과 종들을 위해
